data.title: Expresionismus - The German Expressionists - A Generation in Revolt - Bernard S. Myers (1956)
data.meta_description: Expresionismus - The German Expressionists - A Generation in Revolt - Bernard S. Myers (1956) - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides background information on German Expressionist artists from the early 20th century. It discusses several key Expressionist groups including Die Brücke and Der Blaue Reiter. The summary includes biographical information on influential Expressionist painters such as Ernst Ludwig Kirchner, Karl Schmidt-Rottluff, Erich Heckel, and Emil Nolde who were members of Die Brücke. It also covers Expressionist artists associated with Der Blaue Reiter like Wassily Kandinsky, Franz Marc, Paul Klee, and August Macke. The document aims to give the reader an overview of the German Expressionist movement through short biographies of important figures.
data.text: Expresionismus - The German Expressionists - A Generation in Revolt - Bernard S. Myers (1956)
